fr.aumgn.dac2.game

Class AbstractGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.aumgn.dac2.game.AbstractGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game, Stage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassicGame, Colonnisation, Training

    public abstract class AbstractGame
extends Object
implements Game
    Common implementations of most game mode.
